item.title: By: Henry Neufeld
item.dc:creator: Henry Neufeld
item.description:
Thanks for publishing these remarks and referencing <i>Why Four Gospels?</i>
I'm the publisher of the second edition of <a href="http://whyfourgospels.com"/ rel="nofollow ugc">Why Four Gospels?</a>, and I'd like to note for any recent purchasers that the page numbers in the notes here are to the first edition. In the second edition hey would be [1] 28, [2] 24, [3] 24, [4] 27, and [5] 27-28. (The change in numbering doesn't represent a shorter edition. We numbered the main portion of the book separately from the front matter.)
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for publishing these remarks and referencing Why Four Gospels?

I’m the publisher of the second edition of Why Four Gospels?, and I’d like to note for any recent purchasers that the page numbers in the notes here are to the first edition. In the second edition hey would be [1] 28, [2] 24, [3] 24, [4] 27, and [5] 27-28. (The change in numbering doesn’t represent a shorter edition. We numbered the main portion of the book separately from the front matter.)
